message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,000?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
